tasks.task: Weather forecasting for livestock management during winter in Wyoming
subtasks: Check National Weather Service website for cold weather advisories
Monitor weather reports to anticipate cold snaps and wind chill
Adjust feeding strategy based on temperature and wind chill
Ensure livestock are sheltered from strong winds using row-crop windbreaks or other structures
Increase hay and supplement feeding during colder weather
Assess livestock's nutritional needs based on temperature and wind chill

tasks.task: General winter preparedness for livestock producers
subtasks: Prepare contingency plans for extreme weather conditions
Review recommendations from University of Wyoming Extension for winter livestock management
